title: Parthathila Parthathila Lyrics Diwan
stanzas:
engalukku therinjathellaam
enga durai singamaiyyaa
aezhu kodi jananga nenjil
yaethi vacha deepamaiyyaa

andha vaanatha pola
thevaraiyyaa
emma kaathu nikkum
durai singamaiyyaa

thennavaru konjam
kai asaichaa
andha kadal ala kooda
adangumadaa

nallavaru oru vaartha sonna
enga naatu sanathuku
adhu vedhamadaa

enga saami paecheduthaa
kottaiyellaam kulungumada
avar paadha manneduthu
poosikittaa vetriyadaa

edhir pola sutterikkum
neruppirukkum kangalada
oru podhum thottradhilla
muukulathu singamadaa

mugamthaane paathirukom
avar ullangaiyya
paarthathilla
enga saami seiyyum
tharmathukku
endha imaiyam kooda
eedu illa

engalukku therinjathellaam
enga durai singamaiyyaa
aezhu kodi jananga nenjil
yaethi vacha deepamaiyyaa

andha vaanatha pola
thevaraiyyaa
emma kaathu nikkum
durai singamaiyyaa
